attributes.title: Oranges!!!
attributes.review: It took a Whole month to download & when it Finally did Oranges started appearing everywhere I went!!! A whole orange tree popped up in my backyard & I’ve never even planted anything back there. I don’t even like oranges 🤢🤢🤬😡😤😫

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try to learn about my king, trump. Instead every-time I try to open the app it takes forever and my phone dies. If I have it plugged in, it crashes. Don’t waste you’re time✨

attributes.title: It’s the worst app ever
attributes.review: I was trying to open the app, and the app kept repeating “make America great again” in trumps voice. I couldn’t turn it off. This app is absolutely trash, and that’s were it needs to go.

attributes.title: False information
attributes.review: This app gives out so much false information and the app basically tries to force you to join his campaign and to vote for him. Which is a very cheap way to get re-elected

attributes.title: horrible app.
attributes.review: the app overall is just completely horrible. it is laggy, poorly made, and has many bugs. i would not recommend ANYONE to use it.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it tried HACKING my phone. The pop up add said if it would like to send me notifications?!?! ALL POP UPS MEAN THEY ARE TRYING TO STEAL INFORMATION!!! Do not, I repeat do not download this app unless you want to get hacked by the us government! Very bad.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!
attributes.review: This app is extremely unreliable and full of bogus information! I have never seen something so fabricated and biased in my life. It isn’t surprising considering who this app is for, I don’t know why America let this man be out president.

attributes.title: Gave me
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever! As soon as I downloaded it, it started glitching my phone! Literal rats began crawling out of my phone and I think the app summoned the devil because I can’t get him out of my house! Very upset, I had high expectations.

attributes.title: Plain out horrible
attributes.review: I am appalled of how horrible this app is. Right when I open it I’m greeted with an orange screen. My eyes have been blinded by how bright it was. This app should be taken down forever ✨. Please and thank you 🙏

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever, did not I only see gross pictures of toe nails but also toes. I also saw a big flat ugly orange who also looked like a big obese Cheeto and the quality was so but my phone kept on lagging! Terrible app! I HATE IT!
